TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi CacheDependency extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 在存储于 ASP.NET 应用程序的 对象中的项与文件、缓存键、文件或缓存键的数组，或另一个 对象之间建立依赖关系。

span.span: Establishes a dependency relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's object and a file, cache key, an array of either, or another object.

summary.span: 类监视依赖关系，以便在任何这些对象发生更改时，自动删除缓存的项。

span.span: The class monitors the dependency relationships so that when any of them changes, the cached item will be automatically removed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将项添加到依赖于另一个对象，例如文件或文件，数组的缓存依赖项是自动从缓存中删除该对象发生更改时。If you add an item to the cache that is dependent on another object, such as a file or array of files, the dependent item is automatically removed from the cache when the object changes. 例如，假设您创建对象基于的 XML 文件中的数据。For example, suppose you create a object based on data in an XML file. 您可以添加到缓存对象，利用依赖于 XML 文件。You can add the to the cache with a object that makes the dependent on the XML file. 如果 XML 文件发生更改，从缓存中删除。If the XML file changes, the is removed from the cache. 可以将具有依赖项添加到应用程序的缓存和方法。You can add items with dependencies to your application's cache with the and methods. 不能使用属性将项添加到缓存的依赖项。You cannot use the property to add items to the cache with dependencies. 若要设置依赖关系，您创建的实例类中，指定文件、 密钥或在其的项是相关，目录，然后将传递到的依赖关系或方法。To set up a dependency, you create an instance of the class, specifying the files, keys, or directories on which the item is dependent, and then pass the dependency to the or method. 实例可以表示单个文件或目录、 文件或目录的数组或数组的文件或目录以及缓存密钥的数组 (这些表示存储在其他项对象)。The instance can represent a single file or directory, an array of files or directories, or an array of files or directories along with an array of cache keys (these represent other items stored in the object). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用属性来确定是否自上一个请求中的某个项后更改。The following code example demonstrates using the property to determine whether a changed since the previous request for an item in the . `dt`传入值`start`参数设置为。The `dt` value passed in the `start` parameter is set to . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/CS/t.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/VB/t.vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要派生您自己的类从，实现此版本的构造函数。If you want to derive your own class from , implement this version of the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个实现此版本的类构造函数、 派生的所有类作为所需的。The following code example is a class that implements this version of the constructor as all classes that derive from are required to. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string filename) cil managed

param.name: filename
param.span: 缓存对象所依赖的文件或目录的路径。

span.span: The path to a file or directory that the cached object is dependent upon.

param.span: 当该资源更改时，缓存的对象将过时，并从缓存中移除。

span.span: When this resource changes, the cached object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，它监视文件或目录的更改情况。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors a file or directory for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目录或文件中指定`filename`参数中未找到文件系统中，它将被视为缺失。If the directory or file specified in the `filename` parameter is not found in the file system, it will be treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件时使用依赖项对象将添加到，将从删除的缓存的对象创建目录或文件时。If the directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when the directory or file is created. 例如，假设您添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类并依赖于 XML 文件。The following code example creates an instance of the class with a dependency on an XML file. 方法中再添加到项这是依赖于该文件。The method then adds an item to the that is dependent upon that file. [!code-csharp[Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 此外可以使用以下方法添加到项并依赖于一个文件。You can also use the following technique to add an item to the with a dependency on a file. [!code-csharp[Single File Dependency Cache entry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Single File Dependency Cache entry/CS/DependencySingleFilecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Single File Dependency Cache entry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Single File Dependency Cache entry/VB/DependencySingleFilevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Caching Application Data

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string[] filenames) cil managed

param.name: filenames
param.span: 缓存对象所依赖的一组（到文件或目录的）路径。

span.span: An array of paths (to files or directories) that the cached object is dependent upon.

param.span: 当这些资源中的任何一个更改时，缓存的对象即过时，并从缓存中移除。

span.span: When any of these resources changes, the cached object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，它监视一组（到文件或目录的）路径的更改情况。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories) for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文件或目录数组中的任何更改，或者是从数组中删除缓存的项变得过时并从应用程序的删除对象。If any of the files or directories in the array changes or is removed from the array, the cached item becomes obsolete and is removed from the application's object. 此外，如果任何目录或文件中指定`filenames`参数中未找到文件系统中，它将被视为丢失。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件时使用依赖项对象将添加到，将从删除的缓存的对象创建该目录或文件时。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假设您添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. > [!NOTE] > 在创建包含的文件依赖项的数组时，必须定义的文件数项添加到依赖于。When you create the array that contains the file dependencies, you must define the number of files that the item you are adding to the is dependent on. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法添加到项依赖的文件数组。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to add an item to the with dependencies on an array of files. 您还可以使项依赖于目录的数组。You can also make the item dependent on an array of directories. [!code-csharp[Multiple file based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Multiple file based dependency/CS/DependencyMultiFilecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Multiple file based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Multiple file based dependency/VB/DependencyMultiFilevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，它监视文件或目录的更改情况。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors a file or directory for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目录或文件中指定`filename`参数中未找到文件系统中，它将被视为缺失。If the directory or file specified in the `filename` parameter is not found in the file system, it will be treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件时使用依赖项对象将添加到，将从删除的缓存的对象创建目录或文件时。If the directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when the directory or file is created. 例如，假设您添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. > [!NOTE] > 更改跟踪将立即开始并不直接基于`start`参数。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用`start`参数传递的日期和时间在过去，想要检查的上次修改日期的目录或文件传入的`filename`参数。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of the directory or file passed in the `filename` parameter. 如果的上次修改日期晚于日期和时间设置传入`start`参数，缓存的项已从。If the last modified date is later than the date and time set passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此构造函数来实例化对象，然后将一项插入该依赖项。The following code example uses this constructor to instantiate a object, then inserts an item into the with that dependency. `dt`传入值`start`参数设置为。The `dt` value passed in the `start` parameter is set to . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/CS/t.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/VB/t.vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories) for changes and specifies a time when change monitoring begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何目录或文件中指定`filenames`参数中未找到文件系统中，它将被视为丢失。If any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件时使用依赖项对象将添加到，将从删除的缓存的对象创建该目录或文件时。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假设您添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. > [!NOTE] > 更改跟踪将立即开始并不直接基于`start`参数。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用`start`传入参数传递的日期和时间在过去，想要检查的数组的上次修改的日期`filenames`参数。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of the array passed in the `filenames` parameter. 如果的上次修改的数组中的任何对象的日期晚于日期和时间设置传入`start`参数，缓存的项已从。If the last modified date of any object in the array is later than the date and time set passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建将传递两个 XML 文件的对象和一个值作为参数传递中包括该对象时方法调用。The following code example creates a object that passes two XML files and a value when the object is included as a parameter argument in an method call. param.name: filenames
param.span: 缓存对象所依赖的一组（到文件或目录的）路径。

span.span: An array of paths (to files or directories) that the cached object is dependent upon.

param.span: 当这些资源中的任何一个更改时，缓存的对象即过时，并从缓存中移除。

span.span: When any of these resources changes, the cached object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

param.name: cachekeys
param.span: 一组缓存键，新对象监视它们的更改。

span.span: An array of cache keys that the new object monitors for changes.

param.span: 当这些缓存键中的任何一个发生更改时，与此依赖项对象关联的缓存对象即过时，并从缓存中移除。

span.span: When any of these cache keys changes, the cached object associated with this dependency object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，它监视一组（到文件或目录的）路径、缓存键的更改情况或同时监视二者的更改情况。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories), an array of cache keys, or both for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果任何目录或文件中指定`filenames`参数中未找到文件系统中，它将被视为丢失。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件时使用依赖项对象将添加到，将从删除的缓存的对象创建该目录或文件时。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假设您添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 但是，`cachekeys`依赖项不起作用相同的方式。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果至少一个中的值`cachekeys`参数不存在的插入操作时，插入失败。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 请注意，没有对此方案中引发的异常。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. ## Examples 下面的代码段演示了如何将项插入到应用程序的并依赖于另一个项的键放置在缓存中。The following code fragment demonstrates how to insert an item into your application's with a dependency on a key to another item placed in the cache. 由于此方法使用数组语法，因此必须定义的键的数目的项要添加到依赖。Since this method uses array syntax, you must define the number of keys on which the item you are adding to the is dependent. [!code-csharp[Key based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Key based dependency/CS/DependencyKeycs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Key based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Key based dependency/VB/DependencyKeyvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果任何目录或文件中指定`filenames`参数中未找到文件系统中，它将被视为丢失。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件时使用依赖项对象将添加到，将从删除的缓存的对象创建该目录或文件时。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假设您添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 但是，`cachekeys`依赖项不起作用相同的方式。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果至少一个中的值`cachekeys`参数不存在的插入操作时，插入失败。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 请注意，没有对此方案中引发的异常。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. > [!NOTE] > 更改跟踪将立即开始并不直接基于`start`参数。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用`start`传入参数传递的日期和时间在过去，想要检查的任何对象的上次修改的日期`filenames`或`cachekeys`参数。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of any object passed in the `filenames` or `cachekeys` parameters. 如果的上次修改任何这些对象的日期晚于日期和时间设置传入`start`参数，缓存的项已从。If the last modified date of any of those objects is later than the date and time set passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建`CreateDependency`方法。The following code example creates a `CreateDependency` method. 当调用此方法时，它会创建对象和属性用于将项添加到缓存`key`参数`key1`并将值`Value 1`。When this method is called, it creates a object and the property is used to add an item to the cache with a `key` parameter of `key1` and a value of `Value 1`. 一个字符串，数组`dependencyKey`，然后创建值为`key1`也。An array of strings, `dependencyKey`, is then created with the value of `key1` as well. 这构造函数，然后实例化对象，它将传递`dependencyKey`和对象作为参数自变量。This constructor then instantiates a object that passes `dependencyKey` and the object as parameter arguments. 方法使用接下来，调用对象作为参数。The method is called next, using the object as a parameter. 这使得添加到缓存使用的对象方法依赖于`key1`密钥。This makes the object added to the cache using the method dependent on the `key1` key. summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，它监视一组（到文件或目录的）路径、缓存键的更改情况或同时监视二者的更改情况。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories), an array of cache keys, or both for changes.

summary.span: 它还使自己依赖于 类的一个单独的实例。

span.span: It also makes itself dependent upon a separate instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果任何目录或文件中指定`filenames`参数中未找到文件系统中，它将被视为丢失。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件时使用依赖项对象将添加到，将从删除的缓存的对象创建该目录或文件时。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假设您添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 但是，`cachekeys`依赖项不起作用相同的方式。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果至少一个中的值`cachekeys`参数不存在的插入操作时，插入失败。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 请注意，没有对此方案中引发的异常。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建`CreateDependency`方法。The following code example creates a `CreateDependency` method. 调用此方法时，它使用属性将项添加到缓存`key`的参数`key1`并将值`Value 1`。When this method is called, it uses the property to add an item to the cache with a `key` parameter of `key1` and a value of `Value 1`. 一个字符串，数组`dependencyKey`，然后创建值为`key1`也。An array of strings, `dependencyKey`, is then created with the value of `key1` as well. 构造函数用于创建对象， `dep1`，哪些传递`dependencyKey`作为参数传递。The constructor is used to create a object, `dep1`, which passes `dependencyKey` as a parameter argument. 第二个对象， `dep2`，使用此构造函数，创建`dep1`作为第三个参数自变量传递。A second object, `dep2`, is created using this constructor, with `dep1` passed as the third parameter argument. 此第二个依赖项是依赖于第一个。This second dependency is dependent on the first. 方法使用第二个接下来，调用对象作为参数。The method is called next, using the second object as a parameter. 如果第一个依赖项以任何方式发生更改，则将无效的缓存的项。If the first dependency changes in any way, the cached item will be invalidated. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果任何目录或文件中指定`filenames`参数中未找到文件系统中，它将被视为丢失。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果缺少目录或文件时使用依赖项对象将添加到，将从删除的缓存的对象创建该目录或文件时。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假设您添加到对象并依赖于以下的文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果该文件未找到时对象创建，但更高版本创建，xyz.dat 文件创建时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 但是，`cachekeys`依赖项不起作用相同的方式。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果至少一个中的值`cachekeys`参数不存在的插入操作时，插入失败。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 请注意，没有对此方案中引发的异常。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. > [!NOTE] > 更改跟踪将立即开始并不直接基于`start`参数。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用`start`传入参数传递的日期和时间在过去，想要检查的任何对象的上次修改的日期`filenames`， `cachekeys`，或`dependency`参数。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of any of the objects passed in the `filenames`, `cachekeys`, or `dependency` parameters. 如果的上次修改任何这些对象的日期晚于日期和时间传递`start`参数，缓存的项已从。If the last modified date for any of those objects is later than the date and time passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示`CreateDependency`方法。The following code example shows a `CreateDependency` method. 当调用此方法时，它会创建对象和属性用于将项添加到缓存中使用的密钥参数`key1`并将值`Value 1`。When this method is called, it creates a object and the property is used to add an item to the cache with a key parameter of `key1` and a value of `Value 1`. 一个字符串，数组`dependencyKey`，然后使用设置的值为其第一个 （且唯一的） 索引处的值创建`key1`也。An array of strings, `dependencyKey`, is then created with the value at its first (and only) index set to the value of `key1` as well. 构造函数随后用于创建对象， `dep1`，哪些传递`dependencyKey`作为参数传递。The constructor is then used to create a object, `dep1`, which passes `dependencyKey` as a parameter argument. 第二个对象， `dep2`，使用此构造函数，然后创建`dep1`和对象作为参数自变量传递。A second object, `dep2`, is then created using this constructor, with `dep1` and the object passed as parameter arguments. 此第二个依赖项是依赖于第一个和依赖项监视将开始之后 10 秒`CreateDependency`调用方法。This second dependency is dependent on the first, and dependency monitoring will begin 10 seconds after the `CreateDependency` method is called. 方法使用第二个接下来，调用对象作为参数。The method is called next, using the second object as a parameter. 如果第一个依赖项以任何方式发生更改，则将无效的缓存的项。If the first dependency changes in any way, the cached item will be invalidated. summary.span: 检索 对象的唯一标识符。

span.span: Retrieves a unique identifier for a object.
The unique identifier for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法也可特别用于跟踪的多个实例项或应用程序相关联的类。This method can be particularly useful for tracking multiple instances of the class associated with an item or an application. 标识符是 （适用于文件依赖项） 的文件名称或键名称 （针对缓存键依赖项） 和一个字符串，此方法将分配到的依赖项的组合。The identifier is a combination of either the file name (for a file dependency) or the key name (for a cache-key dependency) and a string that this method assigns to the dependency. 在派生类中类，您可以重写此方法以自定义如何为其生成的唯一标识符。In classes that derive from the class, you can override this method to customize how it generates the unique identifier. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建名为的对象`aggDep`，以两个其数组中的对象。The following code example creates an object, named `aggDep`, with two objects in its array. 一次`aggDep`实例化时，该代码调用方法来生成这两个依赖项的唯一标识符的`aggDep`包含并显示到包含页的标识符。Once `aggDep` is instantiated, the code calls the method to generate a unique identifier for both dependencies that `aggDep` contains and displays the identifiers to the containing page. 随后将项添加到，并使用方法，与`aggDep`作为依赖项。An item is then added to the , using the method, with `aggDep` as a dependency. [!code-vb[CachingSamples_AggregateCacheDependency1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_AggregateCacheDependency1/VB/aggregatecachedependencysamplevb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将项添加到 ASP.NET 应用程序的与。You can add an item to an ASP.NET application's with a . 当发生更改，添加到的项失效并从缓存中删除。When the changes, the item added to the is invalidated and removed from the cache. 可以使用此属性以确定是否已更改，并重新创建中的项如果发生这种。You can use this property to determine whether a has changed, and recreate the item in the if that has occurred. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用属性来确定是否自上一个请求中的某个项后更改。The following code example demonstrates using the property to determine whether a changed since the previous request for an item in the . `dt`传入值`start`参数设置为。The `dt` value passed in the `start` parameter is set to . span.span: Notifies the base object that the dependency represented by a derived class has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从派生的任何类类必须实现此方法。Any class that derives from the class must implement this method. 从类派生时类，您可以使用任何方法或未覆盖的属性的基本功能。When you derive from the class, you use the base functionality of any method or property that you have not overridden. 当您创建派生类的实例时，它表示文件、 缓存键、 数据库表中或想要使缓存的项依赖于其他任意对象。When you create an instance of the derived class, it represents the files, cache keys, database tables, or other arbitrary objects that you want to make a cached item dependent upon. 此方法依赖项发生更改时通知的基本功能类的项已更改，以便的值和可以更新属性。When a dependency item changes, this method notifies the base functionality of the class that the item has changed, so that the values of the and properties can be updated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了继承的类类。The following code example shows a class that inherits from the class. 它将创建一个公共方法： `ResetDependency`，使用方法，以便更改的依赖项的修改的时间，然后调用方法。It creates a public method, `ResetDependency`, that uses the method to change the time at which the dependency was modified, and then calls the method. summary.span: 允许第一个用户声明对此依赖项的独占拥有权。

span.span: Allows the first user to declare exclusive ownership of this dependency.

returns.span: 如果此项第一个获得拥有权，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the item was the first to take ownership otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法声明使用依赖项。This method declares that the dependency is used. 如果另一项之前调用此方法，并且花费了所有权，`false`返回。If another item previously called this method and took ownership, `false` is returned. 一个只能由一个缓存项。A can only be used by one cache entry. 当某项与任何指定的缓存依赖项添加到缓存后时，缓存应获得这些依赖项，以确保，它们不会重复使用某个位置其他的所有权。When an item is added to a cache with any cache dependencies specified, the cache should take ownership of those dependencies to make sure that they are not reused somewhere else.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性被测量以协调世界时 (UTC) （也称为格林尼治标准时间）。This property is measured in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) (also known as Greenwich Mean Time). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用要添加的项，请使用两个类个对象依赖关系， 。The following code example uses the class to add an item, with two object dependencies, to the . 当请求项时，代码检查该项是否处于。When a request for the item is made, the code checks whether the item is in the . 如果是，属性转换为一个字符串，并在页面上显示。If it is, the property is converted to a string and displayed on the page. 项和其两个依赖项不是这样，如果将创建并添加到。If it is not, the item and its two dependencies are created and added to the . [!code-vb[CachingSamples_AggregateCacheDependency1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_AggregateCacheDependency1/VB/aggregatecachedependencysamplevb.aspx#2)]
